thread.title: Monday Blues: No case has been filed against me, MCSK CEO says after arrest claims
thread.title_full: Monday Blues: No case has been filed against me, MCSK CEO says after arrest claims

title: Monday Blues: No case has been filed against me, MCSK CEO says after arrest claims
text:
By Steven Kisuli Muendo Thursday, Oct 15th 2015 at 10:46 MCSK boss Maurice Okoth at a past event Photo:Courtesy 
After a section of the media published a story claiming that the Music Copyright Society of Kenya CEO Maurice Okoth was arrested last week, Maurice now says no case has been filed against him. 
“Yesterday, a complaint was lodged against myself and two colleagues. The file was placed before the DPP this morning and was not registered. This is procedure in cases where there is no evidence to warrant a trial. There is no case that has been filed against us and we are all fine,” Maurice said. 
"Our board chairman had also been arrested two weeks back. His arrest had also been instigated with absolutely no basis. There are reasons why the cases were instigated...and they are malicious to say the least,” he added. 
Maurice told MondayBlues that the society will release an official statement on the two issues this week. SIMILAR STORIES
